description: This file sets up an AI agent using the agno framework, configuring it with a HuggingFace model and DuckDuckGo search tool, and then runs a sample response generation for the topic 'Simulation theory'.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of processing instructions and generating responses.

classes.name: HuggingFace
classes.description: A model wrapper for HuggingFace models, used as the language model for the agent.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool for performing searches via DuckDuckGo, integrated into the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response based on a given prompt.
